Developed automated Excel/VBA tools for loan amortization schedules, interest calculations, and covenant tracking. Created Python scripts for scraping and processing market data. Built data pipelines for integrating third-party pricing data into accounting systems. Performed statistical analysis on loan performance and default rates.

workExperience.title: Individual Investor
workExperience.description: Applied machine learning and statistical analysis to investment decisions. Developed algorithmic trading strategies using Python (scikit-learn, pandas, numpy) with backtesting on historical data. Built predictive models for market direction using time series analysis (ARIMA, LSTM neural networks). Created portfolio optimization tools using modern portfolio theory and risk metrics. Implemented data collection systems (web scraping, API integration) for alternative data sources. Technologies: Python, R, PostgreSQL, Jupyter notebooks.

workExperience.title: PERE Fund Accountant & Automation Specialist
workExperience.description: Fund Accounting for Private Equity and Real Estate Funds (GLP), responsible for preparing financial statements, NAV calculation, CAS compliance, and managing capital activities such as calls and distributions. Developed automation solutions for repetitive workflows, led data migration projects between accounting systems, created custom reporting tools, and provided technical support for accounting software implementations. Skilled in waterfall calculations, fee structures, complex investor allocations, and fund performance analysis.

workExperience.title: Wealth Management Internship
workExperience.description: KYC for physical persons, risk profile analysis, AML and management of bank accounts.

workExperience.title: M&A Analyst Internship
workExperience.description: Work in a buy-side mandate in the heating industry, Searching for potential acquisition.
